title: 积分板问题
author: MsYqgzt
txt_content:
我想用积分板做出一种效果：
当玩家拿起木棍时，使以玩家为中心半径为二范围内的同一队伍的生物不断tp到玩家身上.

replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard players set @a 计分板 0
/scoreboard players set @a 计分板 1 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stick",tag:{display:{Name:"",Lore:["",""]},ench:[]}}}
execute @a[team=...] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[r=2,team=....] @p 
高频按顺序周期执行以上指令

replies.author: 棋实狠爱你
replies.txt_content: =_=  这要命令方块   还要大触来弄

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add stick dummy复制代码
创建名为stick的dummy类型计分板变量

/scoreboard players set @a stick 0复制代码
将stick计分板值为1

/scoreboard players set @a stick 1 {SelectedItemSlot:0,Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:stick}]}复制代码/scoreboard players set @a stick 1 {SelectedItemSlot:1,Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:stick}]}复制代码
检测玩家是否拿着木棍，并将拿着木棍的玩家积分设为1，分别将 {SelectedItemSlot}设为0至8，全部连接高频，比较器输出

/scoreboard teams add GreenTeam复制代码
创建队伍GreenTeam【名字可改

/scoreboard teams join GreenTeam [玩家]复制代码
将玩家加入队伍，可以用@r随机

/execute @a[score_stick_min=1] ~ ~ ~ 
tp @a[r=2] ~ ~ ~ 复制代码
将r=2范围内所有玩家tp到拿着木棍的玩家那里

参考 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210012-1-1.html http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-407720-1-1.html
打字不容易 望采纳
